abstract: Roger C. Altman, whose Evercore Partners has had advisory roles in some of the latest big deals, talked to CNBC.
snippet: Roger C. Altman, whose Evercore Partners has had advisory roles in some of the latest big deals, talked to CNBC.
lead_paragraph: Roger C. Altman — whose Evercore Partners has had advisory role in some of the latest big deals, including Nasdaq’s play for the New York Stock Exchange, AT&T’s proposed acquisition of T-Mobile USA, and Berkshire Hathaway’s bid for Lubrizol — talks to CNBC about the budget battle, issues with the AT&T deal, and the insider trading speculation about David L. Sokol, who recently resigned from Berkshire.

headline.main: From Behind the Scenes, an Influential Adviser Speaks Out
